name: nevdschee/symfony-session-tests
description: A test suite for the Symfony session save handlers (to test locking support)

suggest.ext-memcached: Needed for session storage in Memcache in class MemcachedSessionHandler
suggest.ext-redis: Needed for session storage in Redis in class RedisSessionHandler
suggest.ext-pdo_mysql: Needed for session storage in MySQL using PDO in class PdoSessionHandler
